name: Microsoft - Newly Registered Domains
description: Returns newly registered domains that match Microsoft naming patterns
query: domain:microsoft OR domain: OR domain: OR domain:outlook OR domain:hotmail OR domain: OR domain:skype OR domain: OR domain:azure OR domain:onedrive

name: Microsoft - Website Page Title
description: Returns discovered websites which reference Microsoft in page titles

name: Microsoft - Possible Phishing
description: Returns discovered websites which reference Microsoft in page titles and contain login-related keywords
query: (dom:"Microsoft" AND (dom:login OR dom:signin OR dom:password OR dom:portal OR dom:account OR dom:verify OR dom:secure)) AND NOT resolved_domain:microsoft.com

name: Microsoft - Infostealers
description: Returns discovered infostealer activity targeting Microsoft domain and staff

name: Revolut - Newly Registered Domains
description: Returns newly registered domains that match Revolut naming patterns
query: domain:revolut OR domain:revolutbank OR domain:revolut*pay OR domain:revolutbanking OR domain:revolut*app

name: Revolut - Website Page Title
description: Returns discovered websites which reference Revolut in page titles

name: Revolut - Possible Phishing
description: Returns discovered websites which reference Revolut in page titles and contain login-related keywords
query: (dom:"Revolut" AND (dom:login OR dom:signin OR dom:password OR dom:portal OR dom:account OR dom:verify OR dom:secure OR dom:card OR dom:banking)) AND NOT resolved_domain:revolut.com

name: Revolut - Infostealers
description: Returns discovered infostealer activity targeting Revolut domain and staff

name: PayPal - Newly Registered Domains
description: Returns newly registered domains that match PayPal naming patterns

name: PayPal - Website Page Title
description: Returns discovered websites which reference PayPal in page titles

name: PayPal - Possible Phishing
description: Returns discovered websites which reference PayPal in page titles and contain login-related keywords
query: (dom:"PayPal" AND (dom:login OR dom:signin OR dom:password OR dom:portal OR dom:account OR dom:verify OR dom:secure OR dom:payment OR dom:money OR dom:transfer)) AND NOT resolved_domain:paypal.com

name: PayPal - Infostealers
description: Returns discovered infostealer activity targeting PayPal domain and staff
